data.title: Kim Kardashian channels Uma Thurman in ‚ÄòKill Bill‚Äô with yellow jacket
data.meta_description: Kim Kardashian took a page out of Uma Thurman's book, rocking a yellow motorcycle jacket reminiscent of the "Kill Bill" actress' iconic look.
data.text:
Kim Kardashian is ready for ‚ÄúKill Bill‚Äù Volume 3.

The reality star paid homage to the 2003 movie with an Instagram slideshow Monday, channeling Uma Thurman‚Äôs character in a yellow motorcycle jacket.

‚ÄúCrazy 88,‚Äù the Hulu personality, 42, wrote alongside photos of herself eating sushi, referencing a gang in the film.

The ‚ÄúKardashians‚Äù star later edited the caption to include a famous quote of Thurman‚Äôs as she played The Bride.

‚ÄúYou and I have unfinished business üç£,‚Äù she wrote.

Kardashian, who paired her bright outerwear with black leggings, boots and matching sunglasses, included photos of Thurman, 52, in the social media slideshow.

She also tagged Kill Bill Resto Bar, an establishment in Poland, as the pictures‚Äô location.

The ‚ÄúKeeping Up With the Kardashians‚Äù alum‚Äôs followers took note of her not-so-subtle tribute.

‚ÄúWe didn‚Äôt need context Kim.. if you get it .. you get it,‚Äù one fan wrote.

Another added that Kardashian‚Äôs ‚Äú[out]fit says Kill Bill but [her] lifestyle says Marie Antoinette,‚Äù with many gushing about how ‚Äúcool‚Äù and ‚Äúepic‚Äù she looked.

Last month, the makeup mogul referenced a different ‚ÄúKill Bill‚Äù when she lip-synced to SZA‚Äôs song of the same name in a TikTok video with her 9-year-old daughter, North.

‚ÄúI might kill my ex,‚Äù the lyrics state. ‚ÄúNot the best idea.‚Äù

The Skims creator shares North and her other three children ‚Äî Saint, 7, Chicago, 5, and Psalm, 3 ‚Äî with her ex-husband, Kanye West.

Kardashian‚Äôs most recent ex, however, is ‚ÄúSaturday Night Live‚Äù alum Pete Davidson, whom she split from in August 2022.

As for her dating future, Kardashian told James Corden the following month that she sees herself with a ‚Äúbiochemist‚Äù or an ‚Äúattorney.‚Äù

‚ÄúClearly it‚Äôs not working, whatever I‚Äôm doing,‚Äù she joked at the time. ‚ÄúI feel like I have to ‚Ä¶ go to different places.‚Äù
